Page Not Found { "@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "WebSite", "url": "", "potentialAction": { "@type": "SearchAction", "target": "?q={search_term}", "query-input": "required name=search_term" } } /** * * Blogger Template Documentation * Name : Blog MUI CSS * Date : 8th August 2017 * Designer : Irfaan Programmer * URL : kodeinblogger.blogspot.com * License : This free Blogger template is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License, which permits both personal and commercial use. However, to satisfy the 'attribution' clause of the license, you are required to keep the footer links intact which provides due credit to its authors. For more specific details about the license, you may visit the URL below: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ */ /** * * css-variable * */ /** * * css-layout * */ #layout { min-width: 0; } #layout #sidedrawer { position: static; width: 50%; float: left; } #layout #sidedrawer li { display:none; } #layout #blogsearch { } #layout #header { position:static; float:right; width:50%; } #layout #main-sidebar { float: right; width: 45% } #layout #main-wrapper { float: left; width: 55% } #layout #main-ads { overflow:hidden; width:90%; margin:10px auto; } #layout #footer { clear: both; } /** * * css-normalize * */ #navbar-iframe { height: 0; visibility: hidden; display: none; } html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre, a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code, del, dfn, em, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp, small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var, b, u, i, center, dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li, fieldset, form, label, legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td, article, aside, canvas, details, embed, figure, figcaption, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, output, ruby, section, summary, time, mark, audio, video {margin:0;padding:0;border:0;font-size:100%;font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline;font-family: "HelveticaNeue-Light", "Helvetica Neue Light", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, "Lucida Grande", sans-serif} a img { border-width: 0; } img { max-width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; border: 0; height: auto; } b, strong { font-weight: 700; } cite,em,i{font-style:italic} article, aside, details, figcaption, figure, footer, header, hgroup, menu, nav, section { display: block; } table { border-collapse: collapse; border-spacing: 0; } dt{font-weight:bold} dd{margin:0 0 .5em 2em} abbr, acronym { cursor: help; } sup, sub { vertical-align: baseline; position: relative; top: -.4em; font-size: 86%} sub { top: .4em; } small { font-size: 86%} mark { background-color: #ffce00; color: #182025; } hr { height: 1px; border: none; background-color: #444; } input, button, select, textarea { font-size: 100%; line-height: normal; vertical-align: baseline; } textarea { display: block; box-sizing: border-box; } /** * * css-widget * */ .widget, .section { margin: 0; } .widget li { padding: 0; } .widget ul { padding: 0; margin: 0; line-height: normal; } .widget-content li { list-style-type: none; } /** * * css-heading * */ h1,h2,h3,h4,h5{margin:0;padding:0;display:block;font-weight: 700} h1 {font-size: 150%} h2 {font-size: 140%} h3 {font-size: 130%} h4 {font-size: 120%} h5 {font-size: 110%} /** * * css-fix * */ .quickedit,.blog-feeds,.post-feeds{display:none} .hidden{visibility:hidden:height:0;overflow:hidden;display:none} .clear {clear:both} /** * * css-body * */ body { font-family: "Roboto", "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial; background:$(body.background.color); line-height:1.5; color:$(body.text.color); } /** * * css-link * */ a:link { color: $(link.color); text-decoration: none; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; -webkit-transition: ease-in-out 0.2s; -moz-transition: ease-in-out 0.2s; -ms-transition: ease-in-out 0.2s; -o-transition: ease-in-out 0.2s; transition: ease-in-out 0.2s; } a:visited { color: $(link.visited.color); text-decoration: none; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; } a:hover { text-decoration:underline; } /** * * css-header * */ #header { position: fixed; top: 0; right: 0; left: 0; z-index: 2; transition: left 0.2s; background: $(header.background.color); border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb; } #header .mui--text-title{ -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(16%, #4285f4), color-stop(32%, #ea4335), color-stop(48%, #fbbc06), color-stop(64%, #4285f4), color-stop(80%, #ea4335), color-stop(96%, #ef796e)); } #header .mui--text-title h1 { font-size:100%; display:inherit; } #header .mui--text-title a:hover { text-decoration:none; } @media (min-width:768px){ #header { left: 200px; } body.hide-sidedrawer #header { left: 0; } } /** * * css-navigation * */ #sidedrawer { position: fixed; top: 0; bottom: 0; width: 200px; left: -200px; overflow: auto; z-index: 2; background-color: $(sidedrawer.background.color); transition: transform 0.2s; border-right:1px solid #ebebeb; } #sidedrawer.active { transform: translate(200px); } .sidedrawer-toggle { color: #777; cursor: pointer; font-size: 20px; line-height: 20px; margin-right: 10px; text-decoration: none; } .sidedrawer-toggle:hover { color: #777; } #sidedrawer-brand { text-align: center; } #sidedrawer > ul { padding-left: 0px; } #sidedrawer a { color: $(sidedrawer.link.color); } #sidedrawer a.block { padding:15px 0 15px 25px; display:block; transition: none; } #sidedrawer a.block:hover { background:#ddd; } #sidedrawer ul ul li a { display:block; padding:15px 0 15px 35px; } #sidedrawer ul ul li a:hover { background-color: #E0E0E0; } #sidedrawer strong { display: block; padding: 15px 22px; cursor: pointer; font-weight:normal; color:#000; } #sidedrawer strong:hover, #sidedrawer strong:active { background-color: #E0E0E0; } #sidedrawer .search-input input { padding:10px; border:none; border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb; } #sidedrawer .search-input { position:relative; } #sidedrawer .search-action { position:absolute; top:8px; right:2px; } @media (min-width:768px) { #sidedrawer { transform: translate(200px); } body.hide-sidedrawer #sidedrawer { transform: translate(0px); } } /** * * css-main * */ #content-wrapper { min-height: 100%; overflow-x: hidden; margin-left: 0px; transition: margin-left 0.2s; } #main-wrapper, #main-sidebar { padding:20px 0; } @media (min-width: 768px) { #content-wrapper { margin-left: 200px; } body.hide-sidedrawer #content-wrapper { margin-left: 0; } } /** * * css-main-ads * */ #main-ads .widget { padding-top:20px; text-align:center; } #main-ads img { } /** * * css-post-index * */ .post-outer-container { padding:0; width:calc(100% / 3); float:left; } .post-outer-container:nth-child(3n+1) { clear:both; } .post-outer .post { background:#fff; margin:0 10px 20px 0; border:1px solid #ebebeb; } .post-outer .post-header{ position:relative; overflow:hidden; } .post-outer .post .snippet-thumbnail { max-height:250px; overflow:hidden; background:#ebebeb; } .post-outer .snippet-thumbnail img { width:100%; } .post-outer .post .post-title { background:#fafafa; font-size:18px; border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb; padding:10px; } .post-outer .post-body { padding:10px; } .post-outer .post-snippet.snippet-container { max-height:100px; overflow:hidden; } .post-outer .post:hover .mask { right: -600px; } .post-outer .snippet-thumbnail .mask { width: 600px; height: 303px; background: rgba(255, 255, 255, .1); display: inline-block; position: absolute; right: 350px; top: 0; -moz-transform: skew(-45deg); -webkit-transform: skew(-45deg); -webkit-transition: all .3s ease-in-out; -moz-transition: all .3s ease-in-out; -ms-transition: all .3s ease-in-out; -o-transition: all .3s ease-in-out; transition: all .3s ease-in-out; } @media (max-width:960px) { .post-outer-container { width:calc(100% / 2); } .post-outer-container:nth-child(3n+1) { clear:inherit; } .post-outer-container:nth-child(2n+1) { clear: both; } .post-outer .post .post-title { position:absolute; bottom:0; left:0; right:0; background:#fafafa; font-size:18px; border-bottom:1px solid #ebebeb; padding:10px; } } @media (max-width:768px){ .post-outer .post .post-title { font-size:16px; } .post-outer-container:nth-child(3n+1) { clear:none; } .post-outer-container:nth-child(2n+1) { clear:both; } } @media (max-width:640px) { .post-outer-container { width:100%; } .post-outer .post { position:relative; } .post-outer .post-header { position:static; } .post-outer .snippet-thumbnail .mask { display:none; } .post-outer .snippet-thumbnail img { width:100px; } .post-outer .post .snippet-thumbnail { height:auto; position:absolute; right:10px; bottom:40px; width:100px; } .post-outer .post .post-title { position:static; } .post-outer .post-snippet.snippet-container { max-width:350px; } } @media (max-width:480px) { .post-outer .post-snippet.snippet-container { max-height:65px; max-width:320px; font-size:14px; } .post-outer .post .snippet-thumbnail { width:60px; right:0; bottom:35px; } .post-outer .snippet-thumbnail img { width:60px; } } @media (max-width:360px) { .post-outer .post-snippet.snippet-container { max-width:230px; } } @media (max-width:320px) { .post-outer .post .snippet-thumbnail { display:none; } } /** * * css-sidebar-index * */ #main-sidebar { display:none; } /** * * css-footer * */ #footer { text-align:left; margin-left: 0px; transition: margin-left 0.2s; padding:10px; background-color: $(footer.background.color); border-top:1px solid #e4e4e4; } #footer a { text-decoration: none; color:$(body.text.color); } @media (min-width: 768px) { #footer { margin-left: 200px; } body.hide-sidedrawer #footer { margin-left: 0; } } @media (max-width:640px) { #footer td { float:left; width:100%; text-align:center !important; } } /** * * css-pagination * */ .blog-pager-newer-link { float:left; } .blog-pager-older-link { float:right; } .home-link { } #blog-pager { text-align:center; clear:both; } /** * * css-post-message * */ .no-posts-message { clear:both; text-align:center; background:#fff; border:1px solid #ebebeb; padding:10px; } .not-found-container { position:fixed; top:0; left:0; right:0; bottom:0; background:#fff; z-index:100; } .not-found { width:250px; margin:0 auto; position:absolute; left:50%; top:50%; transform:translate(-50%,-50%); } .not-found h1 { -webkit-background-clip: text; -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent; background-image: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(16%, #4285f4), color-stop(32%, #ea4335), color-stop(48%, #fbbc06), color-stop(64%, #4285f4), color-stop(80%, #ea4335), color-stop(96%, #ef796e)); } @media (max-width:480px) { .not-found { width:80%; } } @media (max-width:480px) { .not-found { width:90%; } } /** * * css-search * */ #BlogSearch1 .search-input{ position:relative; display:block; } #BlogSearch1 input { padding:10px; } #BlogSearch1 button{ position:absolute; right:5px; top:22px; background:none; border:none; } /** * * css-breadcrumb * */ .breadcrumb { border:1px solid #ebebeb; -webkit-box-shadow:none; box-shadow:none; } @media (max-width:768px) { .breadcrumb { display:none; } } /** * * css-custom * */ .mui-btn--custom { border:1px solid #ebebeb; } // function website_content_move(content,destination){var fragment = document.createDocumentFragment(); fragment.appendChild(document.getElementById(content)); document.getElementById(destination).appendChild(fragment); } function check_element(id){var check=0; if (document.getElementById(id)) {check=1; }else {check=0; } return check; } function insertAfter(postadsmove,postadstarget) {var parent = postadstarget.parentNode; if (parent.lastChild == postadstarget) {parent.appendChild(postadsmove); } else {parent.insertBefore(postadsmove,postadstarget.nextSibling); q+=""; q+=""; document.write(q); r++; if(r==relmaxtampil) { break; } } var jurlrel = urlrel ? n++ : ""; if(D" + reljudul[D] + ""; q += ""; r++; document.write(q); if (r == relmaxtampil) { } } var jurlrel = urlrel ? n++ : ""; if (D < reljudul.length - 1) { D++} else { D = 0; } if (D == z) { break; } } if(jurlrel == 0) { if (urlrel == urladress) { var relatednone = document.getElementById("postrelatedmove"); relatednone.style.display="none"; } } } ; // // // double click pre window.onload = function(){document.body.addEventListener('dblclick', function(e){var target = e.target || e.srcElement; if (target.className.indexOf("prettyprint") !== -1 || target.parentNode.className.indexOf("prettyprint") !== -1){var range, selection; if (document.body.createTextRange) {range = document.body.createTextRange(); range.moveToElementText(target); range.select(); } else if (window.getSelection) {selection = window.getSelection(); range = document.createRange(); range.selectNodeContents(target); selection.removeAllRanges(); selection.addRange(range); } e.stopPropagation(); } }); }; // Home
